lead_paragraph: Laura Diaz shot a bogey-free six-under-par 65 yesterday to take the first-round lead in the Canadian Women’s Open in Edmonton, Alberta, while the 17-year-old Michelle Wie opened with a 75 to drop 10 strokes back.
snippet: Laura Diaz shot a bogey-free six-under-par 65 yesterday to take the first-round lead in the Canadian Women’s Open in Edmonton, Alberta, while the 17-year-old Michelle Wie opened with a 75 to drop 10 strokes back.
